name: Abdyrahman
meaning: Abdy (arap. gul, gullukçy/hyzmatkär) + Rahman (arap. merhemetli, mähirli) atlaryndan meýdana gelen at bolup manysy - 'mähirli Allanyň guly'.

name: Abdyrahym
meaning: Abdy (arap. gul, gullukçy/hyzmatkär) + Rahym (rehimli, şepagatly, mähriban, Allanyň epiteti) - atlaryndan meýdana gelen at bolup manysy = 'mähriban, rehimli Allanyň wepaly guly'.

name: Abdyrazak
meaning: Abdy (arap. gul, gullukçy/hyzmatkär) + Razak (rysgy; rysgaly ýetiriji) - atlaryndan meýdana gelen at bolup manysy = 'Rysky, rysgaly ýetiriji Allanyň wepaly guly'.

name: Abdyrehim
meaning: Abdy (arap. gul, gullukçy/hyzmatkär) + Rehim (ara. merhemetli, rehimli, şepagatly) atlaryndan meýdana gelen at bolup manysy - 'merhemetli Allanyň guly'.

name: Abdyresul
meaning: Abdy (arap. gul, gullukçy/hyzmatkär) + Resul (arap. wekil, iberilen adam) atlaryndan meýdana gelen at bolup manysy + 'Alla tarapyndan iberilen ynamly we wepaly gul/hyzmatkär'.

name: Adalatmyrat
meaning: Adalat (adyl, adalatly, gylyç) + Myrat (isleg, maksat, arzuw) - atlaryndan meýdana gelen at bolup manysy = 'dyl arzuw, adalatly maksat'

name: Adam
meaning: 1) Hakyky/ dogruçyl adam (ynsan) bolsun. 2) Ilkinji pygamberiň ady

name: Annaberdi
meaning: Anna (Baýram, Anna güni) + Berdi (Alla tarapyndan berilen, sowgat edilen) atlaryndan meýdana gelen at bolup manysy - 'Alla tarapyndan anna güni berilen, sowgat edilen çaga'.
